title: Jakarta Migration MCP Server Input
description: Input parameters for Jakarta Migration MCP Server. This Actor provides MCP tools for analyzing and migrating Java applications from Java EE 8 (javax.*) to Jakarta EE 9+ (jakarta.*).

mcpTransport.title: MCP Transport Mode
mcpTransport.description: Transport mechanism for MCP communication. Use 'sse' for HTTP-based MCP clients (required for Apify deployment).
enumTitles: Standard Input/Output (stdio) - For local MCP clients
Server-Sent Events (SSE) - For HTTP-based MCP clients (Apify)

mcpSsePort.title: SSE Port
mcpSsePort.description: Port number for SSE transport mode (only used when mcpTransport is 'sse')

mcpSsePath.title: SSE Path
mcpSsePath.description: HTTP path for SSE endpoint (only used when mcpTransport is 'sse')

licenseKey.title: License Key
licenseKey.description: License key for premium features. Use your Apify API token for Apify-based licensing, or Stripe license key for Stripe-based licensing. Leave empty for Community tier (free features only).

apifyValidationEnabled.title: Enable Apify License Validation
apifyValidationEnabled.description: Enable license validation via Apify API. Set to false to disable Apify validation (useful for local testing).

stripeValidationEnabled.title: Enable Stripe License Validation
stripeValidationEnabled.description: Enable license validation via Stripe API. Set to false to disable Stripe validation.

defaultTier.title: Default License Tier
defaultTier.description: Default license tier when no license key is provided

apifyApiToken.title: Apify API Token (Server)
apifyApiToken.description: Your Apify API token for making license validation requests. This is YOUR account token, not the user's license key. Required if Apify validation is enabled.

stripeSecretKey.title: Stripe Secret Key (Server)
stripeSecretKey.description: Your Stripe secret key for making license validation requests. Required if Stripe validation is enabled.

maxTotalChargeUsd.title: Maximum Total Charge (USD)
maxTotalChargeUsd.description: Maximum total charge allowed per Actor run (for Pay-Per-Event billing). Set to 0 for no limit.
